title: Tsakatskarish Toba
about: Tsakatskarish Toba is located in Samegrelo-Zemo Svaneti on the Egrisi range at 2580 MSL. Tsakatskarish Toba is very beautiful due to the location and colour. The lake is difficult to access as there is no path leading to it, therefore, most of the time hikers tent to enjoy the view at the lake from the pass. The lake is very close to the Kalalish Toba.
